name: T1-eRRa
description: The human world has ceased. Nothing is left alive on the planet T-1 ERRA. Those who lived there have left their last breaths to develop their legacy called the "Great Mother", a fluid containing reconstructive cells. Having awakened from its slumber, FR-N4N-D 2 must carry out the only mission it has been given: to bring the "Great Mother" to Sector 0.
